GSD.product_version: versions from v5.10 to before v5.10.127
GSD.description:
igb: fix a use-after-free issue in igb_clean_tx_ring

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.127 by commit c12a2c9b1b460ed72e6b3c33aac1ef51b0329b66, it was introduced in version v5.10 by commit 9cbc948b5a20c9c054d9631099c0426c16da546b. For more details please see the references link.
